name: amabietalk
0:
”Alexa, start Amabie talk.”
”Alexa, open Amabie talk.”
”Alexa, begin Amabie talk.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amabie talk
des:
Amabie talks a word.

Amabie is a half-man and half-fish monster transmitted to Japan.
In Japan, there are legends that copying the illustrations of Amabie will cure the pandemic.

So, if Amabie talked with this skill, I thought that it would encourage someone and developed it.
For now, if you're still talking, just give a random reply. 
I will continue to develop with this skill to have a fun conversation !
The skill’s responds includes both English and Japanese languages.

The icon image of this skill and the image displayed on the image-compatible terminal were used secondarily from the images published in Kyoto University Rare Materials Digital Archive.

Kyoto University Rare Materials Digital Archive
https://rmda.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/item/rb00000122
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
